text: "I Juswannachill" is a song by American emcee Large Professor, released on October 29, 1996,Large Professor – Ijuswannachill (CD/Vinyl Single) AllMusic. Accessed on August 23, 2019. as the second single from his debut album The LP; the album was shelved by Geffen Records before eventually being released in 2009.Large Professor – The LP AllMusic. Accessed on August 23, 2019. The song contains a sample of "Enchanted Lady" by Milt Jackson. ==Track listing== ===12" single=== A-side #"I Juswannachill" (Clean) #"I Juswannachill" (LP Version) #"I Juswannachill" (Instrumental) B-side #"Hard!" (Clean) #"Hard!" (LP Version) #"Hard!"
